Plastic Use, Trade and Pollution Data Ex: Share of global plastic waste exports
Share of global plastic waste imports

column3: Net exports of plastic waste are calculated as a country's plastic waste exports minus its imports. Countries that are net exporters of plastic waste will have a positive value; those that are net importers will have a negative value.

Plastic Use, Trade and Pollution Data Ex: Net exports of plastic waste per capita
column3: Net exports of plastic waste are calculated as a country's plastic waste exports minus its imports. Countries that are net exporters of plastic waste will have a positive value; those that are net importers will have a negative value.
